section_title: Power to make orders as to fisheries for lobsters and other crustaceans.
section_text: 1 1 Section 1(1) of the  Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) Act 1967 (which enables the Secretary of State to make orders as to fisheries for shellfish) is amended as follows. 2 After “clams” there is inserted  “                , lobsters              ” . 3 After “molluscs” there is inserted  “                or crustaceans              ” .
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) (Amendment) Act 1997. 2 This Act does not extend to Northern Ireland.
